title: Raspberry.System
description:
Raspberry.System is a DNX assembly available for Mono/.NET and CoreCLR providing access to Raspberry Pi system features.

It is an initiative of the Raspberry# Community, aimed at  providing tools  and information  concerning use  of Raspberry Pi boards  with Mono/.NET  framework.
 Visit  project [ Github site ]  (https: //github.com/raspberry-sharp/raspberry-sharp-system/) for documentation and samples.

packOptions.summary: Raspberry.System is a DNX assembly available for Mono/.NET and CoreCLR providing access to Raspberry Pi system features.
